title: New Technology Released to Assist Collateral Title Loan Clients
text: New Technology Released to Assist Collateral Title Loan Clients FindTitleLoans.com announces platform that allows customers to search for quality local lenders. It's a game changer...What is unique about our matching system is that by working with our lenders you eliminate the risk of being taken advantage of. We protect the needs of the consumer in this way. CHICAGO, IL, August 12,   FindTitleLoans.com , a Chicago-based tech start-up, has announced today the development of a system that connects loan consumers to lenders in their area. Over a year in development, the idea behind FindTitleLoans.com began with a desire to efficiently match title loan consumers with reputable local lenders and to thereby obviate the need for searching on their own. The cloud-based technology, can be used by anyone who has access to the web. The tool searches an extensive database of geo-specific lenders within the company's partner network and identify a lender that meets their precise specifications for a loan. In addition to acquiring critical information about lenders and loan programs, users of the service can read and leave lender reviews. "It's a game changer," says FindTitleLoan.com PR Director, Samuel Battaglia. "It is the philosophy of FindTitleLoans.com that an informed consumer is a better consumer. But the benefit of the service extends to the lenders as well. Most lenders prefer to work with a customer who has done her due diligence and is confident she is getting the best deal available....It's a win-win," he adds. FindTitleLoans.com prescreens all lenders within their network, and works only with organizations that meet specific criteria. Qualified lenders must adhere to all regulatory provisions, refrain from engaging in any predatory lending practices, and are not negatively rated by the Better Business Bureau. By taking this step, FindTitleLoans.com can be certain that they are working only with the most reputable lenders in the industry. "What is unique about our matching system is that by working with our lenders you eliminate the risk of being taken advantage of. We protect the needs of the consumer in this way" said Battaglia. To try the service, simply search among a database of over 60 quality lenders now by using the Locations Service . FindTitleLoans.com matches consumers with reputable local lenders providing collateral title loans. Using a geo-targeting comparison platform, the tool searches an extensive database of specific lenders within the company's partner network and identifies a lender that meets the prospective borrowers' precise specifications and budget. The SQL-based technology can be used by anyone who has access to the web. In this way, the loan matching system finds the best title loan for a particular loan consumer's unique needs and priorities, and to do so in a reasonably short amount of time. # # #
